Pre-Game Insights: Australia are favourites to earn maximum points in Adelaide on Thursday night
Popovic should be able to inspire his troops to a maiden win of Group C on Thursday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alessandro Circati will be sidelined for the remainder of the 2024-25 campaign due to a cruciate ligament injury
Conor Metcalfe is in the medical room of St Pauli due to a groin strain sustained earlier this month
Others: The Socceroos endured a terrible night at home to Bahrain on September 5, when despite having over 70% possession they were unable to breach the visitors' net
China suffered a seven-goal thumping at the hands of Japan on September 5
